manifesto.label: Our Manifesto
manifesto.title: Ethical software, built to last
manifesto.kiba_meaning: "Kiba" means fang in Japanese. Like the Akita, a breed known for unwavering loyalty and protection, we protect your data and digital business.
manifesto.paragraph_1: Kiba.Studio was born as an ethical software laboratory. Founded by a fullstack developer with over 6 years of experience in Laravel, Vue.js, Node and Python, the agency focuses on values that others overlook: privacy, transparency and quality without compromise.
manifesto.paragraph_2: We're not a factory that mass-produces websites. We're a technical boutique that believes in code as a tool for freedom, not dependency. Your data is a responsibility we take seriously, not a commodity to monetize. Every solution we build is designed to empower your business, not bind it.
manifesto.paragraph_3: We work with Japanese seriousness: order, cleanliness, structure, rigor. Our code speaks for itself: tested, documented, maintainable. No shortcuts, no hidden technical debt. Only scalable, secure and lasting solutions.
manifesto.feature_privacy_description: Your users' data is a sacred responsibility. Zero invasive tracking, zero data selling.
manifesto.feature_tech_description: Software as a tool for empowerment. No dark patterns, no forced dependency.

services.label: Our Services
services.title: Complete digital solutions
services.subtitle: From design to deployment, we build ethical and scalable software
services.frontend_description: We create responsive and accessible user interfaces with Vue.js 3, React and Nuxt. Responsive design, fluid animations, performance optimized for every device.
services.backend_description: We develop scalable backends with Laravel and Node.js. RESTful APIs, secure authentication, optimized database management, clean and tested architecture.
services.server_description: We configure and manage Linux servers, Docker containerization, Kubernetes orchestration. Monitoring, security, automatic scalability.
services.automation_description: We automate repetitive processes with Python and Bash. Ethical scraping, data processing, task scheduling, third-party API integration.
services.consulting_description: We offer consulting on software architecture, technology choice, code review, refactoring. We help internal teams improve quality and processes.

process.label: Our Method
process.title: How we work
process.step_1_description: We start with an in-depth analysis of your business needs, goals and technical constraints. Together we define the best strategy, project scope, realistic timeline and sustainable budget.
process.step_2_description: We create detailed wireframes, interactive mockups and define scalable technical architecture. Design is not just aesthetics: it's usability, accessibility, performance.
process.step_3_description: We develop in agile sprints with weekly demos. Clean, tested, documented code. We use Git for versioning, CI/CD for automatic deployments, code review for quality.
process.step_4_description: Functional, performance, and security testing. Every feature is validated across different devices and browsers. Complete security audit, penetration testing, OWASP compliance.
process.step_5_description: Deploy on secure and scalable infrastructure. We configure 24/7 monitoring, automatic backups, disaster recovery. Post-launch support includes maintenance and updates.
